COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Carlos Lezcano
ej,winfd001,P,palld901,Call at 2B Dave Winfield ejected by 2B umpire Dave Pallone
Protest=V

ej,colej106,M,harrl901,Balk call (reversed) $HP umpire Lanny Harris called a balk on Eric Rasmussen; Padres manager Jerry Coleman protested and was ejected by Harris;  2B umpire Eric Gregg overruled Harris and said there was no balk;  Coleman protested the game
$ball got past catcher Ron Hodges and went to the screen; Gene Richards stood at the plate and argued the third strike instead of running to 1B
$Dave Collins called for interference
$Dave Concepcion called for interference for running into his own bunt
ej,torrj101,M,palld901,Call at 2B (Appeal) $Doug Flynn singled but Elliott Maddox missed 2B and was out on appeal; Mets Manager Joe Torre ejected by 2B umpire Dave Pallone
$Intervening misplay, so not DP
$Art Howe called for interference
ej,mazzl001,P,palld901,Balls and strikes (Foul tip) Lee Mazzilli ejected by HP umpire Dave Pallone
Debut game for Jose Moreno

umpchange,1,umphome,davis901 umpchange,1,ump2b,(None) umpchange,1,ump3b,varge901 $HP umpire Gregg left when hit on mask by foul; 3B umpire Davidson went behind the plate, 2B umpire moved to 3rd and game was finished with 3 umpires
ej,cey-r001,P,kiblj901,Charging mound after HBP $Ron Cey started towards the Pat Zachry but was restrained; Cey ejected by HP umpire John Kibler
$3B Larry Parrish called for obstruction, allowing the second run to score
$Bill Gullickson threw a knock down pitch at Frank Taveras

ej,steaj001,P,froeb901,Fighting $Bill Gullickson threw a knock down pitch at Mike Jorgensen on the third pitch to the hitter; Jorgensen got up and took about four steps towards the mound and pointed his bat at Gullickson; both benches cleared and John Stearns ran to the mound, hit Gullickson with a right then clamped the pitcher in a headlock; Mets 3B coach Chuck Cottier tackled Larry Parrish; several fans threw fire crackers onto the field; Stearns (not in the game) ejected by HP umpire Bruce Froemming
$an apparent wild pitch hit the screen and caromed back to Ted Simmons
$Alex Trevino's throw hit Garry Templeton, who was called for interference
Protest=H
ej,torrj101,M,colon901,Obstruction non-call $Mets manager Torre ejected by 3B umpire Colosi for arguing that Youngblood was obstructed during rundown; he protested the game
ej,brisd801,M,olsea901,Demanding lights be turned on Giants Manager Dave Bristol ejected by 3B umpire Andy Olsen demanding that the lights be turned on
DWS: the above two lines are one play
Debut game for Orlando Isales
Lee Mazzilli called for interference
Might be Lynch relieved with 0-2 count on Robinson
missing play in NYN198010010 fielding credit invented

ej,torrj101,M,froeb901,Call at 2B $Mets manager Torre ejected by 2B umpire Froemming for arguing runner from 1st had been forced at 2nd but umpire ruled SS missed base; 1bman thought it was a double play and rolled ball to mound; SS ran in, picked up ball and had runner Berra in rundown but threw wildly into center field allowing run to score
